h1: How Many Calories in Boba Milk Tea?
assumptions: Standard 16 oz serving with black tea, whole milk, tapioca pearls, and moderate sugar syrup; no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by shop, milk type, sweetness level, pearl amount, and size. Check menus or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A standard 16 oz boba milk tea contains about 400 calories, mostly from sugar and pearls.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in boba milk tea with less sugar?
faqs.a: About 300 kcal for a standard serving with reduced syrup.

faqs.q: What makes boba milk tea high in calories?
faqs.a: Sugar syrup and tapioca pearls contribute most, around 200-250 kcal combined.

faqs.q: Are there low-calorie boba milk tea options?
faqs.a: Yes, opt for unsweetened tea, non-dairy milk, or no pearls to drop below 200 kcal.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in boba milk tea?
faqs.a: Typically 60 g per 16 oz serving, mostly added sugars.

faqs.q: Does milk type affect calories in boba tea?
faqs.a: Whole milk adds more fat/calories than skim or plant-based alternatives like almond milk.
